project_descr: Support to One UN Monitoring and Evaluation Framework and Development of the UN knowledge management agenda in Albania.

outputs.output_title: Support to One UN M& E
donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: Projects aims the establishment and maintenance of a UN Albania common Framework for monitoring and evaluation (M&E) and Knowledge Management (KM).  This will be achieved through the use of technically sound results frameworks, improved data collection and management, and increase evaluative capacity.
